name: RedVBlue-Dominator or Underdog
description:
In RvB-Dominator or Underdog, the Player has to choose between two armys. One stronger, one a Underdog. Fight with the Underdog and gain more Upgrades, or fight with the stronger Army. But dont think you can cheese yourself through. YOU will be the Underdog soon.

I wasnt able to finish this game sadly,so for aiming you will have to use Linetraces. Apologies.
Movement is WASD, Left and Right Mousclick to Fight and X to Heal
